trans-unit.source: Represents a declaration for an event of a type.
CodeMemberEvent can be used to represent event members of a type.
trans-unit.target: CodeMemberEvent 可以用來表示事件類型的成員。

trans-unit.source: CodeMemberEvent has properties to indicate the data type of the event, whether it privately implements a data type, and what interface types, if any, the member event implements.
trans-unit.target: CodeMemberEvent 具有表示事件的資料型別、 是否未公開實作的資料類型，以及哪些介面類型，如果有的話，成員事件所實作的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeMemberEvent"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeMemberEvent"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data type that the member event implements.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定成員事件所實作的資料類型。

trans-unit.source: The types referenced should consist of interfaces or the base class.
trans-unit.target: 參考的型別應該包含基底類別或介面。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReferenceCollection"></xref> that indicates the data type or types that the member event implements.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReferenceCollection"> </xref> ，指出資料類型或成員事件所實作的型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the privately implemented data type, if any.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定非公開實作的資料類型，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: The types referenced should consist of interfaces or the base class.
trans-unit.target: 參考的型別應該包含基底類別或介面。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference"></xref> that indicates the data type that the event privately implements.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference"> </xref> ，指出事件公開實作的資料型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data type of the delegate type that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定處理事件的委派類型的資料類型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference"></xref> that indicates the delegate type that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference"> </xref> ，指出處理事件的委派類型。
